texts.biography: When Tarnum finally beats Gelu to Volee, he discovers that the Sword of Frost has already been taken by Kija, who had escaped from her dungeon prison a few weeks earlier. Now he's wandering over the lands hoping The Reckoning will never happen.
texts.name: Tarnum

specialty.description:
{Whiteout}

Tarnum casts Whiteout spell at the beggining of the battle. For three turns all enemy units have -25% to Attack, Defence, Speed and Damage. Spell can be countered by Dispel, Cure, Protection for Water and Bless spells
specialty.name: Whiteout
